text:
"The Octonauts" is an American-British-Ireland television series broadcasted by Disney Junior from March 24, 2012 until July 28, 2018. It is produced by Silvergate Media, Brown Bag Films, Chorion, and Disney Junior Original Production for the Disney Channel channel Disney Junior. Its first episode ran on March 24, 2012.
It is like "Star Trek" and "Thunderbirds" along with the adventures of Jacques Cousteau.
